description: Fit hunk Johnny Rapid and boy-next-door Michael Boston haven't seen each other in years. The boys get together again for a good old fashioned movie night, but things take a turn when Michael finds the unimaginable on his old friend's television-- gay porn! The unexpected surprise gives the two fit studs a chance to broach some long-standing questions about their relationship, and soon Johnny and Michael are admitting that there's always been something between them. Johnny alternates between tenderly breaking Michael in and roughly dominating him in this hole pounding reunion.
title: You've Changed, Bro
